model_prompts.segmentation_prompt: Please segment the submitted paper into rhetorical sections and output JSON exactly in this format: {"segment_data":{...}}. Use the fields: [Title],[claiming centrality],[Describing Real-world Phenomena],[Claiming Importance in the Real World],[Describing Real-world Problem(s)],[Introducing Existing Solution(s)],[Reviewing Previous Research],[Identifying Research Gap(s)],[Showing Mixed Findings],[Articulating Research Purpose(s)],[Method],[Claiming Contribution(s)],[Implication]} and also produce an "error_part" list containing detected error codes from the allowed list.
model_prompts.error_explanation_prompt: Given the student's text for a highlighted span and the code (e.g. A1), explain concisely *why* this is an instance of that error for this student, then provide a personalized fix suggestion and a 1-2 sentence model-corrected rewrite. Output JSON: {"code":"A1","span":"...","reason":"...","suggestion":"...","rewrite":"..."}
